Definition: Categorization of the risk substance as a food, drug, or environmental agent. For difficult-to-classify substances, one can leave this field empty or choose the most typical category.

Short: Code representing categorization of the risk substance as a food, drug, or environmental agent. For difficult-to-classify substances, one can leave this field empty or choose the most typical category.
